name: Abacus AC Solutions Ltd
overview:
A little bit about Abacus AC Solutions Ltd We specialise in the supply, installation and maintenance/repair of heating, ventilation and air conditioning systems to retail, commercial, industrial and domestic premises in London, Essex, Kent, Surrey, Sussex, Berks, Bucks, Hertfordshire and throughout the UK. Our services include exclusive maintenance and repair contracts offered to all sectors from small offices, home and retail units to large multi site blue-chip companies and local authority buildings. We also offer complete facilities management services.

Air Conditioning and ventilation planned preventative maintenance contracts We can provide service calls to carry out a one off maintenance of equipment or diagnostics and repairs also planned preventative maintenance contracts usually based on two, three or four visits per year to keep your HVAC equipment operating as efficiently as possible and to reduce the risk of break downs especially during the summer months when adequate cooling is essential.

Installation services for commercial and domestic properties Working with the global leaders in climate control, Abacus installs only state-of-the-art air conditioning and ventilation technology for its clients in industry, academia and research. Our partners, including Mitsubishi, Toshiba and Daikin are all world class manufacturers but more than this, they are pioneers, investing heavily in research that constantly improves the design of their HVAC systems. This, in turn, improves the energy efficiency performance saving you money and impacting positively on the bottom-line. By choosing Abacus to install your equipment you will be helping to keep your staff comfortable all year round, whatever the weather. Our systems also improve ventilation, making any environment more hygienic and productive.

Why us? We have built our reputation on providing complete industry services including design, installation, service and maintenance of HVAC and refrigeration equipment to meet our clients individual requirements and the F-Gas regulation. Our client database includes some of the UK’s largest privately owned Companies and retail outlets along with Embassies, local authority sites and smaller domestic properties. The service we offer is second to none and we pride ourselves on our speedy response times, reliability and professionalism. All our HVAC engineers are experienced and fully qualified.

Nationwide coverage At Abacus we offer nationwide coverage providing installation, maintenance, breakdown and property management services including the following areas…
